context: Hi! I really liked the movie Mission: Impossible (1996). Can you suggest any other movies like it?
Mission: Impossible (1996) was a great movie, did you see the secuels?
I haven't. What are they called?
resp: Mission: Impossible – Ghost Protocol (2011) and Mission: Impossible – Rogue Nation (2015) are my favorites
